name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
description: A centrally sponsored housing scheme aimed at providing affordable housing to the urban poor.
eligibilityCriteria: Beneficiary must be a resident of India
Income must be below a certain threshold
Beneficiary must not own a pucca house
applicationProcess: Apply through the official PMAY website or through a designated bank
Submit required documents (identity proof, income certificate, etc.)
If approved, beneficiary receives financial assistance for constructing or purchasing a house

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: A crop insurance scheme aimed at providing financial support to farmers in case of crop failure or damage.
eligibilityCriteria: Crops must be insured under the PMFBY scheme
applicationProcess: Apply through designated insurance companies or banks
Pay the required premium
In case of crop loss, claims can be filed and compensation received

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
description: A financial inclusion scheme aimed at providing access to banking services to all households.
eligibilityCriteria: Beneficiary must be an Indian citizen
Beneficiary must not have a bank account
applicationProcess: Visit a designated bank branch
Submit required documents (identity proof, address proof, etc.)
Open a basic savings bank account

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: A social welfare scheme aimed at providing free LPG connections to women from Below Poverty Line (BPL) households.
eligibilityCriteria: Beneficiary must be a woman from a BPL household
Beneficiary must not have an existing LPG connection
Beneficiary must possess a valid Aadhaar card
applicationProcess: Apply through the official PMUY website or designated distribution agency
Submit required documents (identity proof, address proof, BPL certificate, etc.)
If approved, beneficiary receives a free LPG connection and a stove

name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
description: A skill development scheme aimed at providing industry-relevant skill training to youth and promoting entrepreneurship.
eligibilityCriteria: Beneficiary must be between 15-45 years of age
Beneficiary must meet the minimum educational qualifications required for the chosen training program
applicationProcess: Find an approved training center or partner institute
Apply for the desired training program
If selected, complete the training and receive a certificate or certification

name: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY)
description: A national health protection scheme that aims to provide healthcare coverage to underprivileged families in India.
eligibilityCriteria: Beneficiary must be a member of a household listed in the Socio-Economic Caste Census (SECC) database
Beneficiary must not be covered under any other health insurance scheme
applicationProcess: Check eligibility through the official AB-PMJAY website or mobile app
Visit an empaneled hospital and present the AB-PMJAY card or e-card
Receive cashless healthcare services up to INR 5 lakh per year

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY) - Gramin
description: A centrally sponsored housing scheme aimed at providing affordable housing to the rural poor.
eligibilityCriteria: Beneficiary must be a resident of a rural area
Income must be below a certain threshold
Beneficiary must not own a pucca house
applicationProcess: Apply through the designated local authorities
Submit required documents (identity proof, income certificate, etc.)
If approved, beneficiary receives financial assistance for constructing a new house or upgrading an existing one

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
description: A centrally sponsored scheme aimed at promoting efficient water management practices in agriculture.
eligibilityCriteria: Beneficiary must be a farmer or a farmer producer organization
Proposed projects must meet the eligibility criteria set by the state government
applicationProcess: Apply through the designated state government authorities
Submit project proposal and required documents
If approved, receive financial assistance for implementing water management practices
